serviceBody: PandaTrack is a web application for tracking purchases and collectible items. It lets you discover and save stores, log orders and items, track pre-orders and payments, and follow shipments in one dashboard. The Service is provided for personal, non-commercial use to organize your collecting activity. We aim to give you one source of truth for what you bought, what is on the way, and what you still need to pay.
